title: This video sheds light on how Modi and Amit Shah allegedly misused their authority in a case involving the surveillance of a woman, with the help of an IPS officer.
selftext: Are we so blind? What has Narendra modi ever done except fake promises and being a part of rapid reported declining economy of India?
comments: Yes, it's a very famous case. Unfortunately, there won't be justice in this case as well.
Bcoz venom is a blinding drug
They were never good guys they're just a better option compared to dim wits in Congress who'll give the whole land to extremists.
You forget that the average Indian parent wants kids to be spied upon and controlled.
There used to be an old case of chacha. He used to stalk a college girl as well...
Sadly justice In India is only for the rich and not for the poor.
